name: @dapr/js-sdk
description: The official Dapr (https://dapr.io) SDK for Node.js

scripts.test:e2e:common: TEST_SECRET_1=secret_val_1 TEST_SECRET_2=secret_val_2 dapr run --app-id test-suite --app-protocol grpc --app-port 50051 --dapr-grpc-port 50050 --components-path ./components npm run test 'test/e2e/main.test.ts'
scripts.test:e2e:actors: dapr run --app-id test-suite --app-protocol grpc --app-port 50051 --dapr-grpc-port 50050 --components-path ./components npm run test 'test/e2e/actor.test.ts'
scripts.start:dev: npm run build && nodemon --ext ".ts,.js" --watch "./src" --exec "npm run build"

author: Xavier Geerinck
